title: Clinical Competency Enhancement: Multidisciplinary Patient Queue Management Training Technology Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic healthcare system comprehension and mathematical calculation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: One can design multidisciplinary educational content using the five phases of the ADDIE model
One can develop and simulate mathematical models analyzing patient queue data
Learners can comprehensively express learning content through project deliverables (storyboards, infographics, analysis reports)
In team-based problem-solving processes, learners can calculate health equity indicators and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
